title: President Zardari condemns Bannu terrorist strike, praises soldiers’ valor
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 16 (APP): President Asif Ali Zardari on Tuesday strongly denounced the terrorist incident in Bannu Cantonment and paid homage to the martyred soldiers for thwarting the attacks.
In a statement, the president highlighted that the nation’s soldiers prevented a major loss through swift action.
The president expressed that the entire nation was proud of the brave soldiers’ sacrifice and paid tribute to the security forces for their role in foiling the terrorist attack in Bannu Cantonment.
The President reiterated his commitment to eliminate those engaged in such despicable activities. He offered prayers for the martyrs, seeking their elevation in paradise and requesting patience for their grieving families.
